attributes.action: Put preasure on all UK supermarkets to stop or reduce the amount of plastic shopping bags given out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If its not one plastic bag its another.Millions of bags are given away every day.Most of them by the Uk's leading supermarkets.We are all told to recycle our plastic bags and packaging, but still the supermarkets keep churning out their plastic bags thousands of them each week.
My Petition is to get the Uk Govenment to put preasure on all leading supermarkets to stop giving out bags or reduce even further the amount of plastic bags we use when shopping? All It takes is one of the leading supermarkets to lead the way then all of them will follow suit.Please add your name if you want to make a difference. thank you
